name: A Friend (LD46)
description:
In this game you can feed your ghost buddy.
Created for Ludum Dare 46.

Controls :

- Click on the box to type your Ghost Name with the keyboard, click on submit and Play !

- Eat Button (To feed your ghost)

- Click on surprises!

ALT+F4 to leave. (Will update tomorrow)

Might have some bugs.

Lack of a real ending & death as I didn’t had time to finish my animations.
Will update & upgrade the game at a later date.

This is my first "finished" GameJam during which I assume all tasks.
A challenging but unvaluable exercice.
